div.p: Dr. Allen's read aloud... The Girl Who Ran. #WPSlearns #WPScares

div.style: background-color: #ffffff;
background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: We know if WPS students don't get their #ProjectReadAloud stories they will huff and puff and blow your house down!! So we won't make them wait to listen to The Three Little Pigs from Disney's Storybook Collection read by another great @UMassMedical student #WPSlearns #WPScares

a.data-title: We know if WPS students don't get their #ProjectReadAloud stories they will huff and puff and blow your house down!! So we won't make them wait to listen to The Three Little Pigs from Disney's Storybook Collection read by another great @UMassMedical student #WPSlearns #WPScares

img.alt: Image for the Tweet beginning: We know if WPS students

div.style: background-color: #ffffff;
background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: Message from Forest Grove Middle School. #WPSlearns #WPScares

div.style: background-color: #ffffff;

div.p: #ProjectReadAloud is back this week with even more read alouds for WPS students AND we have special guest readers from @UMassMedical bringing you some of their favorite stories! Today you will find The Little Red Hen Makes A Pizza! by Philemon Sturges. #WPSlearns #WPScares
